page.title: 13ASTON HOUSE FARM -SUDBURY
page.content: {Tenant Farmer:}-Henry Jeffery & Son. {Landowner:}- Lord Vernon {Acreage:}- 318 acres {Grass:}- 180 acres {Wheat:}-73 acres {Barley:}- 15 acres {Potatoes:}-35 acres {Oilseed Rape Three men and a part-time worker. {Dairy}-170 cows for milk production- {Fresian breed.}Milk yield-20litres per cow per day. Each cow produces one calf per year. In summer they graze in the fields. In winter they eat{silage, which is condensed grass, also{cow {cake}made from cereals. They live in the farm buildings all winter.They are{milked}twice a day at{0600}and {1530}by one man. The milking takes 2 hours and is done by machine in a {'Parlour'.}A cow eats 1000kg of silage during the winter.{The farmer gets 15p {per litre for his milk.
